title: 台北/Alliance Bernstein Investment/產品發展策略實習生
content:
【公司名稱／工作職缺】
Alliance Bernstein Investment/產品發展策略實習生

【工作內容】
1. Support daily administrative functions to the team and manager.
2. Produce regulatory and internal regular reporting.
3. Assist finance claims and paperwork.
4. Maintain market data collections and updates.
5. Provide supports in ad-hoc projects as required.

【工作地點】
台北市信義區信義路五段7號

【工作時間】
09:00~18:00(中間休息1.5小時, 周休二日)

【徵求條件】
1. Finance/Business major preferred.
2. Familiar with Microsoft Office. (ex. Excel, PowerPoint...etc.)
3. Ability to work as a team, and organization skills as well as attention to
details.
4. Good command in English in both written and spoken.
5. Commit to work in office at least 3 days per week.

【加分條件】
Lipper or Morning Star experience will be a plus.

【薪資待遇】
$200/小時

【公司福利】
可參加每日晨會及報表會議

【聯絡方式】
聯絡人：鍾先生 

email: jacobchung@staff.1111.com.tw

【其他備註】
應徵者請寄送中、英文CV及Cover Letter至信箱，並註明是在哪個平台看到此實習機會!
